1. Take 3/6/10 cups for each team.

 2. Place cups on the two sides of the table on triangle shape.

 3. Take at least 2 ping-pong balls.

 4. Decide which team starts the game.

 5. The aim of the game is to throw the ball to every of the enemy's cups.

 6. Teams throws 2 balls alternately.

 7. Each turn you have 2 shots. If 2 balls fall into the same enemy's cup you got 1 extra shot.

 8. At the end of each turn defenders team has to drink the beer from the cups that has been "checked". They cannot throw before the cups are empty.

 9. When the ball spins around cup's walls the defenders team can try to blow it up. If it works, there is no "check" for attackers.

 10. The game ends when one team has no cups left. Then they lose.

 Have fun!

1. Split into 2 teams. Everyone get a full beer.

 2. Get an empty beer can and rock/ball to throw.

 3. Place the empty can in the middle.

 4. Each team stands on the line in the equal distance from the can.

 5. One team throws the rock. If it hits and knocks over the can, the throwing team starts to drink the beer. Meanwhile one person from other team runs to the can. Makes it stand and returns to the team.

 6. When the runner crosses the line, the drinking stops.

 7. If somebody drink all his beer, he wins.

 8. If everyone from any team empties all the beers - they win.

 Good Luck ;)

There are a plenty of roles available in mafia. Here are some of them that we have chosen to our game:

 1. Game Master - he is the master of the game. He handles the narration during the game, notes who's killed/healed etc.

 2. Cattani (cup, detective) - Game Master wakes him up once per night. Then he can check one player and GM shows him if he is a good or a bad character.

 3. Mafia member - It's a bad character. Each night mafia members wake up and decide who's gonna be killed that night.

 4. Medic - Each night he wakes up and chooses who's gonna be healed. He cannot heal the same person twice. If he heals the same person that mafia decided to kill - nobody dies that night.

 5. City member - City member has no special abilities. He can vote like everybody but he does not wake up during night.

 6. Sniper - Sniper has an ability to once during the day shoot somebody. If he shoots mafia member, then mafia member dies. If he shoots one of the "good guys" they both die.

 7. Courtesan - Courtesan wakes up once during each night and chooses someone that she sleeps with. When the day starts GM tells who slept with courtesan. It has no consequences and brings only humorous value.

 8. Jude - He is almost the same as city member. The only difference is that when Cattani "checks" him. GM has to say that he's a mafia member besides he's not

 9. Lawyer - Once per game when somebody is voted up to be killed, the lawyer can save him from death. (Then you can vote for someone else or end the day phase).

 10. Judge - Once per game the judge can use his special ability and vote as two people.
